title: 关于MM怪攻击一般突然停止攻击
author: YuriJoker
txt_content: 就是打着打着突然不打了，怎么解决？

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
设置追踪距离
FollowRange: XX

replies.author: YuriJoker
replies.txt_content:
Mucrazy 发表于 2019-5-18 20:22
设置追踪距离
FollowRange: XX
